name: gpw_v3_count
title: Population (GPW V3, UN Adjusted)
description: Population count (UN Adjusted values) from the Gridded Population of the World v3. GPWv3 depicts the distribution of human population across the globe. Source data provided in 2.5 arc-minute grid cells.
details: No additional processing of raw data.

extract_types_info.sum: total population per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Center for International Earth Science Information Network - CIESIN - Columbia University, United Nations Food and Agriculture Programme - FAO, and Centro Internacional de Agricultura Tropical - CIAT. 2005. Gridded Population of the World, Version 3 (GPWv3): Population Count Grid. Palisades, NY: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC). http://dx.doi.org/10.7927/H4639MPP.
